text: khyang am mpyeneikia khyange, 1:30 leisawngnak am taki cun Pamhnam naw cawkeiki; am ani üng Pamhnam naw cawkeiki, lü leisawngnak am taki. Pamhnam hnengkia khyange, khyang mlungso, kyäp säihkia ngaikia khyange, awcahkia khyange, mkhyekatnak akthai mtüikia khyange, nupaa pyen am cungaikia khyange,
